name: landing-template
description: Template web site with landing page to track telegram bot user source.

scripts.build:py: npm run generate-proto && npm run compile:ts && python build.py
scripts.build:go: npm run generate-proto && npm run compile:ts && go run main.go
scripts.lint: npm run lint:py && npm run format && ruff format
scripts.generate-proto: npm run generate-proto:go && npm run generate-proto:py && npm run generate-proto:ts
scripts.generate-proto:py: mkdir -p generated/pb && python -m grpc_tools.protoc -I./proto --python_out=./generated/pb --pyi_out=./generated/pb ./proto/*.proto && touch generated/__init__.py

author: jules | zae
